repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04 
MAINTAINER neil@grogan.ie 

ENV DIRPATH /data 
ENV INSTALL_PKGS nodejs npm 

RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y $INSTALL_PKGS && \
/usr/bin/npm install -g gulp && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR $DIRPATH 
VOLUME $DIRPATH 

CMD ["/usr/bin/npm install && gulp"]
